citations.narrative:
There was a board missing creating a gap between the floor and the wall in the stall being used as a rabbit
enclosure. This condition could allow the rabbits to become trapped or injured. The enclosure needs to be
maintained in good repair in order to protect the rabbits from injury.
**********Correct by Jan. 9, 2017
An exit briefing was conducted with the licensee,

narrative:
3.53(a)(1)
PRIMARY ENCLOSURES.   
There was a board missing creating a gap between the floor and the wall in the stall being used as a rabbit
enclosure.  This condition could allow the rabbits to become trapped or injured.  The enclosure needs to be
maintained in good repair in order to protect the rabbits from injury. 
**********Correct by Jan. 9, 2017
An exit briefing was conducted with the licensee,
